: : SharpClaw : :
SharpClaw senses how uneasy KitKat is. Maybe she would relax a bit with the energin. He took a sip of his.

SharpClaw: If you dont mind me asking, why do you try to remain so emotionless? I can understand it in battle, but why when you are among friends? Has there been something bad in your past?

OOC: Outch, burning the the DrillBit/KitKat relationship now, Logo? Hehe.


raccoon7679 <raccoon7679@...> wrote:KitKat::

She looked at SharpClaw not sure what to make of this bot with his 
emotion chip out of place. She walked with him to the mess hall.  She 
kept her face plates black.  She didn't like showing emotions. They 
get in the way. She remembered what happened to her before she was 
buried. She remembered the bot who  had taken her spark. In the end, 
it proved her undoing and her ruin.  She remembered how her emotions 
had been used against her in ways unthinkable. She sat down at the 
table, and let him get some energon for them.  She lowered her head 
and thought of the past. And then she lifted her head and looked at 
SharpClaw. She closed her optics a second and promised not to make 
the same mistake again. She frowned slightly and looked around the 
mess hall.




--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : SharpClaw : :
> SharpClaw: Great. We can get to know each other.
> 
> SharpClaw leads her to the mess hall and to a table, where he gets 
to glasses of energin.
>
